mapper.select:
SELECT
, TVPB.PRCD_NM, TVPB.DUTY_ORG_NM, TVPB.DUTY_EMP_NM FROM TB_VOC_MGMT_PRCD_DTL TVMPD INNER JOIN TB_VOC_PRCD_BAS TVPB ON TVMPD.PRCD_CD = TVPB.PRCD_CD WHERE MGMT_PRCD_CD IN
#{item.mgmtPrcdCd}
ORDER BY TVMPD.MGMT_PRCD_ODRD
mapper.delete:
